patthana24.19:1.1_0: Nasaraṇo nasappaccayo dhammo araṇassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana24.19:3.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:4.1_0: Nasaraṇo naanidassano dhammo saraṇassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana24.19:4.1_1: Nasaraṇo naanidassano dhammo araṇassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana24.19:5.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:6.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:7.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:7.1_1: Naaraṇaṁ narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:8.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā saraṇo arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:8.1_1: Nasaraṇaṁ naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā araṇo arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:9.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:10.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā araṇo lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:11.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:12.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo kenaci naviññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
